Microsoft's Server and Tools Business- in many ways the epicentre of its cloud strategy- is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of long-time division president Bob Muglia . While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues" Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues-17745" target="_self"> wrote in a January 10 email to employees announcing Bob Muglia 's removal. Charles Ellis Schumer ( D-N.Y.). This report confirms what many of us have long suspected: the British government and BP wanted Abdelbaset al-Megrahi released so that an oil deal being negotiated with Libya could go forward. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand said the findings only heighten her worry that Megrahi's release undermines the international struggle against terrorism.
